oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Newspaper seeks open court record in West Memphis triple slaying case
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West Memphis Three; West Memphis, Arkansas; murders; Commercial Appeal; newspapers; 1990s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "The Commercial Appeal has filed a lawsuit objecting to the proposed sealing of the court file in the West Memphis triple murder case."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sullivan, Bartholomew
